alert.note: Alert for Willamette National Forest (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 06 at 1:50PM PDT until September 07 at 12:00AM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT PDT TONIGHT FOR SIGNIFICANTLY UNSTABLE CONDITIONS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 608... * AFFECTED AREA...In Oregon, Fire Weather Zone 608 Willamette National Forest. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...15-25 percent. * HAINES...6 (high). * WIND...Southwest 3 to 6 mph, but 6 to 10 mph near the Cascade crest. * IMPACTS...Conditions may be favorable for rapid spread on any new or existing fires. Extreme fire behavior is possible. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of the above conditions can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
